content: 26 - single_crochet around 14 single_crochet round 27 - single_crochet 2 decrease around 7 single_crochet round 28 - single_crochet in each single_crochet around 7sc finish off leaving a long tail for cinching and sewing weave tail through the last row pulling tightly and sewing in turn hat inside out and sew in loose ends tightly add your favorite tree topper such as a star motif snowflake motif cross motif or pom pom
